member.name: T:SharpKml.Engine.FileHandler
member.summary: Handles downloading of files from a URI, such as local files or network files.

member.name: M:SharpKml.Engine.FileHandler.OpenRead(System.Uri)
member.summary: Reads a file from either http, ftp or local and returns a stream to its contents.
member.param: The uri to obtain the data from.
member.returns: The file contents as a read-only stream.
member.exception: An error occurred reading the file. See the for more details.

member.name: M:SharpKml.Engine.FileHandler.ReadBytes(System.Uri)
member.summary: Reads a file from either http, ftp or local and returns its entire contents.
member.param: The uri to obtain the data from.
member.exception: An error occurred reading the file. See the for more details.

member.name: T:SharpKml.Engine.KmzFile
member.summary: Represents a Kmz archive, containing Kml data and associated files.
member.remarks: The entire Kmz archive (in its compressed state) will be held in memory until a call to is made.

member.name: M:SharpKml.Engine.KmzFile.Create(SharpKml.Engine.KmlFile)
member.summary: Creates a new KmzFile using the data specified in the KmlFile.
member.param: The Kml data to add to the archive.
member.returns: A new KmzFile populated with the data specified in the KmlFile.
member.remarks: This overloaded version does not resolve any links in the Kml data and, therefore, will not add any local references to the archive.
member.exception: kml is null.

member.name: M:SharpKml.Engine.KmzFile.Create(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new KmzFile using the data specified in the Kml file.
member.param: The path of the Kml file.
member.returns: A new KmzFile populated with the data specified in the Kml file.
member.remarks: Any local references in the file are written to the Kmz as archived resources if the resource URI is relative to and below the location of the Kml file. This means all absolute paths, such as <href>/etc/passwd</href>, are ignored, as well as relative paths that point to point to an object that is not in the same folder or subfolder of the Kml file, e.g. <href>../../etc/passwd</href> will be ignored for the file "/home/libkml/kmlfile.kml".
member.exception: path is null.
An I/O error occurred.
An error occurred while parsing the KML.

member.name: M:SharpKml.Engine.KmzFile.Open(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Opens a KmzFile from the specified stream.
member.param: The stream to read the data from.
member.returns: A KmzFile representing the specified stream.
member.exception: stream is null.
The Kmz archive is not in the expected format.
An I/O error occurred.
The stream does not support reading.
The stream was closed.

member.name: M:SharpKml.Engine.KmzFile.Open(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a KmzFile from the specified file path.
member.param: The URI for the file containing the KMZ data.
member.returns: A KmzFile representing the specified file path.
member.exception: path is null.
The Kmz archive is not in the expected format.
An I/O error occurred.

member.name: M:SharpKml.Engine.KmzFile.AddFile(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Adds the specified data to the Kmz archive, using the specified filename and directory path within the archive.
member.param: The name, including any path, to use within the archive.
The data to add to the archive.
member.exception: path is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters as defined by .
path/data is null.
has been called on this instance.

member.name: M:SharpKml.Engine.KmzFile.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this instance.

member.name: M:SharpKml.Engine.KmzFile.GetDefaultKmlFile
member.summary: Loads a default inside this archive.
member.returns: A KmlFile representing the default KML file in the specified KMZ archive or null if no KML data was found.
member.remarks: This method checks for duplicate Id's in the file and throws an exception if duplicate Id's are found. To enable duplicate Id's use the class and pass the root element to .
member.exception: has been called on this instance.
An error occurred while parsing the KML.

member.name: M:SharpKml.Engine.KmzFile.ReadFile(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the specified file from the Kmz archive.
member.param: The file, including directory information, to locate in the archive.
member.returns: A byte array if the specified value parameter was found in the archive; otherwise, null.
member.exception: has been called on this instance.

member.name: M:SharpKml.Engine.KmzFile.ReadKml
member.summary: Extracts the default Kml file from the archive.
member.returns: A string containing the Kml content if a suitable file was found in the Kmz archive; otherwise, null.
member.remarks: This returns the first file in the Kmz archive table of contents which has a ".kml" extension. Note that the file found may not necessarily be in the root directory.
member.exception: has been called on this instance.

member.name: M:SharpKml.Engine.KmzFile.RemoveFile(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the specified file from the Kmz archive.
member.param: The file, including directory information, to locate in the archive.
member.returns: true if the specified file was found in the archive and successfully removed; otherwise, false.
member.exception: has been called on this instance.

member.name: P:SharpKml.Engine.KmzFile.DefaultEncoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the default string encoding to use when extracting the Kml from a Kmz archive. Defaults to UTF8.
